basics.summary: I graduated from Istanbul Technical University with a B.Sc. degree in the Department of Manufacturing Engineering. I got a double major in Mechanical Engineering in Spring, 2022. I am very adaptable to new environments. I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills. I am able to handle multiple tasks on a daily basis and I use a creative approach to solve any given problem. Some of my greatest strengths are being great at time management and my communication skills.
